<!ELEMENT BIS_VTR_NR EMPTY > <!ATTLIST BIS_VTR_NR BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST BIS_VTR_NR PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST BIS_VTR_NR SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST BIS_VTR_NR WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT BUCHPER EMPTY > <!ATTLIST BUCHPER BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST BUCHPER PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST BUCHPER SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST BUCHPER WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT Content ( PARAMETER ) >
<!ELEMENT DB EMPTY > <!ATTLIST DB BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST DB PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST DB SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST DB WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT MANDANTEN EMPTY > <!ATTLIST MANDANTEN BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST MANDANTEN PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST MANDANTEN SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST MANDANTEN WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT OUTPUT EMPTY > <!ATTLIST OUTPUT BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST OUTPUT PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST OUTPUT SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST OUTPUT WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT PAKETGROESSE EMPTY > <!ATTLIST PAKETGROESSE BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PAKETGROESSE PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PAKETGROESSE SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PAKETGROESSE WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT PARAMETER ( UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST, RV_JN, STDOUTJN, OUTPUT, BUCHPER, MANDANTEN, AB_VTR_NR, BIS_VTR_NR, PAKETGROESSE, ANZAHL_VTR, PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA, PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA, DB, RUN_PLAUSI, RUN_BUCINV ) >
<!ELEMENT PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA EMPTY > <!ATTLIST PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA EMPTY > <!ATTLIST PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT RUN_BUCINV EMPTY > <!ATTLIST RUN_BUCINV BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST RUN_BUCINV PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST RUN_BUCINV SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST RUN_BUCINV WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT RUN_PLAUSI EMPTY > <!ATTLIST RUN_PLAUSI BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST RUN_PLAUSI PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST RUN_PLAUSI SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST RUN_PLAUSI WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT RV_JN EMPTY > <!ATTLIST RV_JN BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST RV_JN PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST RV_JN SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST RV_JN WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT STDOUTJN EMPTY > <!ATTLIST STDOUTJN BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST STDOUTJN PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST STDOUTJN SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST STDOUTJN WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST EMPTY > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST WERT CDATA "null" >
]> <Content> <PARAMETER> <UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="E" WERT="N"/> <RV_CSV BESCHREIBUNG="CSV Ausgabe für Rückersicherung J/N" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="EIW" WERT="J"/> <STDOUTJN BESCHREIBUNG="CSV Error File" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="J"/> <OUTPUT BESCHREIBUNG="Steuert welche Output Dateien erstellt werden" PLAUSI="E/T/P/R/S" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="T"/> <BUCHPER BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="JJJJMM" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT=""/> <MANDANTEN BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="01,02,20,21,54" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="01,02,20,21,54"/> <AB_VTR_NR BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT=""/> <BIS_VTR_NR BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT=""/> <AUSSCHLUESSEDATEI BESCHREIBUNG='VTR_NR Ausschluesse via Datei in "filerpath"\input\"BATCHNAME")' PLAUSI='FREITEXT' SEPPL='EIWP' WERT=''/> <PAKETGROESSE BESCHREIBUNG="Anzahl Verträge pro Lauf" PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="10000"/> <ANZAHL_VTR BESCHREIBUNG="Max. Anzahl an erfolgreich zu verarbeitetenden Verträgen " PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT=""/> <PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA BESCHREIBUNG="Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" PLAUSI="OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="AUSSCHL"/> <PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA BESCHREIBUNG="Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" PLAUSI="INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="WARN"/> <DB BESCHREIBUNG="1=Produktion; 3=Spiegel" PLAUSI="1,3" SEPPL="EWI" WERT="3"/> <RUN_PLAUSI BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="E" WERT="J"/> <RUN_BUCINV BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="E" WERT="J"/> </PARAMETER> </Content>

row.process:
! BBS Standart-Include zum setzen von Variablen für aufgerufene Jobs :INC JOBI.BBS.JOBPDEFAULTS ! --------------------------------------------- ! Weitere Variablenbelegung ! ! --------------------------------------------- !**********GeneratedText, Do Not Change********** :SET &pttyp# = SYS_ACT_PTTYP() !Eintragen der READ Befehle :BEGINREAD :IF &pttyp# = "D" : PRINT "", "Bei Start via GUI wird die Eingabe der Startzeit unterdrückt" :ELSE : READ &START#,,"START [JJJJ-MM-TT HH:MM:SS]",'',K :ENDIF :READ &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST#,,"UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST [J/N]",'N',K :READ &RV_CSV#,,"RV_CSV [J/N]",'J',K :READ &STDOUTJN#,,"STDOUTJN [J/N]",'J',K :READ &OUTPUT#,,"OUTPUT [E/T/P/R/S]",'T',K :READ &BUCHPER#,,"BUCHPER [JJJJMM]",'',K :READ &MANDANTEN#,,"MANDANTEN [01,02,20,21,54]",'01,02,20,21,54',K :READ &AB_VTR_NR#,,"AB_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &BIS_VTR_NR#,,"BIS_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &AUSSCHLUESSEDATEI#,,"AUSSCHLUESSEDATEI [FREITEXT]",'',K :READ &PAKETGROESSE#,,"PAKETGROESSE [NNNN]",'10000',K :READ &ANZAHL_VTR#,,"ANZAHL_VTR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &DB#,,"DB [1,3]",'3',K :READ &RUN_PLAUSI#,,"RUN_PLAUSI [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_BUCINV#,,"RUN_BUCINV [J/N]",'J',K :ENDREAD
!Eintragen der PSET Befehle :PSET &START# = &START# :PSET &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# :PSET &RV_CSV# = &RV_CSV# :PSET &STDOUTJN# = &STDOUTJN# :PSET &OUTPUT# = &OUTPUT# :PSET &BUCHPER# = &BUCHPER# :PSET &MANDANTEN# = &MANDANTEN# :PSET &AB_VTR_NR# = &AB_VTR_NR# :PSET &BIS_VTR_NR# = &BIS_VTR_NR# :PSET &AUSSCHLUESSEDATEI# = &AUSSCHLUESSEDATEI# :PSET &PAKETGROESSE# = &PAKETGROESSE# :PSET &ANZAHL_VTR# = &ANZAHL_VTR# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# :PSET &DB# = &DB# :PSET &RUN_PLAUSI# = &RUN_PLAUSI# :PSET &RUN_BUCINV# = &RUN_BUCINV# !**************End of GeneratedText************** :SET &LDATE# = SYS_LDATE("JJJJMMTT") :PSET &LYEAR# = SUBSTR(&LDATE#, 1, 4)
:IF &BUCHPER# = "" : PSET &BUCHPER# = "&LYEAR#12" :ENDIF
